28 Cameron Rigby

Class Senior

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2016 – Junior Season

Suited up in 10 games, drawing the starting job as a running in eight of those contests… Finished second the Wildcats squad with 333 yards on 64 carries… Averaged 5.2 yards per carry across the campaign… Scored three times on the ground… Picked up an average of 33.3 yards per game… Hauled in 11 receptions for 44 yards… Rushed for 24 yards on a pair of carries at Football Bowl Subdivision (FBS) opponent North Texas… Rushed five times for 38 yards and his first career touchdown against Tennessee State… Caught a season-high matching three passes out of the backfield in that game against the Tigers of TSU… Carried the ball seven times for 24 yards at home against eventual MEAC champion North Carolina Central… Rushed seven times for 30 yards and a touchdown, adding a reception for five yards in the first win of the year at Norfolk State… Registered a career-best 106 yards on 11 carries, scoring one touchdown in the process at home in a win over Delaware State… Ran the ball a career-high 15 times for 55 yards at Morgan State… Tallied a career-high matching three receptions for 35 yards in the win over the Bears in Baltimore… Picked up 38 yards on five rushing attempts in the Florida Blue Florida Classic win against Florida A&M… Ran five times for 11 yards, adding a reception in the season ending game at South Carolina State…

2015 – Sophomore Season

Played in four games in his first season with the Wildcats… Rushed eight times for 49 yards on the year… Averaged 6.1 yards per carry… Rushed for five yards in a home win over Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference (MEAC) opponent Savannah State… Registered a season-best 37 yards on three carries, including a 26-yard burst in a win over Morgan State… Also had his first career reception out of the backfield in that game against the Bears… Collected seven yards on three carries in the Florida Blue Florida Classic win over Florida A&M at Camping World Stadium in Orlando…

Miramar High School

Transferred to Miramar High following his sophomore year in high school… Had the winning touchdown for Miramar against St. Thomas Aquinas… First Team All-Broward County offense as a sophomore… Named Second Team All-Broward County on defense as a sophomore at Chaminade-Madonna… Also received an offer from Florida Atlantic out of high school…
